title: UmerIdrees
author: UmerIdrees
content: Well, there was a fear in the market about the Hush money case but now he has been given Unconditional discharge in this case and due to this we see a market pumping right when this news was on air. The bitcoin market is fundamentally driven and any good or bad news has a serious impact on the market. With this news, i think we are back on track to a full-fledged bull season

comments.body: Got what he deserved I guess, there was not really any huge movement on the market price of Bitcoin, because of the trump news, but I guess its still a good thing having good news since it can easily pump the market even though we are already on a rollercoaster but around 90k was still very high, lower than 90k for sure I'm going to buy Bitcoin, I mean that is just a huge discount in the market and that opportunity might not happened anymore.Notice a lot of countries that are interested in using Bitcoin as their countries reserve this might be a huge catalyst in the coming months that could trigger Bitcoin bullrun, I mean were already in Bull run but it might be the top of the Bullrun if this country started actually to buy.Fidelity predicts countries and central banks that once avoided Bitcoin will start buying it in 2025More Countries to Establish Bitcoin Reserves in 2025, Fidelity SaysBitcoin Reserve Proposals Hit Global Crescendo: Countries Exploring Strategic BTC ReservesNations States Turn To Bitcoin As A Strategic Reserve AssetI would say that the market is in good condition and just waiting for it to skyrocket, looking back at the history, this was all going to a huge Bullrun!

Well basically I wasn't expecting anything against trump because he's so smart and wouldn't let himself get into anything that will push him away from his incoming position. comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: Quote from: Churchillvv on January 10, 2025, 06:33:11 PMIt's unfortunate that we are stuck in political statements or events so much on bitcoin this days, absolutely every big political action now has an effect on bitcoin and it seems to me that we're probably becoming more controlled with in this situation. Bitcoin independently making it's moves is now becoming hard except for news and trump activities..... so sad IMHO. We are not just talking about any top politician from any small country; we are talking about the president-elect of a country with the largest economy and so much power. We are talking about someone who has promised the Bitcoin community a crypto-friendly governance. I'm not fully in support of Trump, but in times like this I don't expect less. Take it or leave it; any news in respect of crypto that comes from the USA has more effect on the price of Bitcoin, both negatively and positively, more than any other factor you might think of.
